radiographic_examinations.findings: The pulmonary arteries opacify normally without filling defects. Pathologic mediastinal and right hilar adenopathy is unchanged including a 13 mm subcarinal node and 15 mm right hilar node. Multiple enlarged left axillary nodes, the largest measuring 3.6 x 2.2 cm. A new small left pleural effusion with associated relaxation atelectasis, also present on the right to a lesser degree. A small paraesophageal hernia. Tiny 4 mm left thyroid nodule and a 3-mm tiny pulmonary nodule likely intrapulmonary lymph node.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Pathologic mediastinal and right hilar adenopathy is unchanged in the 60 interval.
